categori ii (nation park) lake helen lassen volcan nation park locat shasta, lassen, plumas, tehama counties, california, usa nearest&#160;c red susanvil coordin 40°29′16″n 121°30′18″w﻿ / ﻿40.4876594°n 121.5049807°w﻿ / 40.4876594; -121.5049807coordinates: 40°29′16″n 121°30′18″w﻿ / ﻿40.4876594°n 121.5049807°w﻿ / 40.4876594; -121.5049807 area 106,452 acr (166.331&#160;sq&#160;mi; 43,080&#160;ha; 430.80&#160;km2)[1] establish august 9, 1916 visitor 407,653 (in&#160;2012)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic map lassen volcan nation park mount shasta lassen peak lassen volcan nation park unit state nation park northeastern california. domin featur park lassen peak, largest plug dome volcano world southern-most volcano cascad range.[3] lassen volcan nation park start two separ nation monument design presid theodor roosevelt 1907: cinder cone nation monument lassen peak nation monument.[4] sourc heat volcan lassen area subduct northern california coast gorda plate dive north american plate.[5] area surround lassen peak still activ boil mud pots, stink fumaroles, churn hot springs.[6] lassen volcan nation park one area world four type volcano found (plug dome, shield, cinder cone, strato).[7] park access via state rout sr 89 sr 44. sr 89 pass north-south park, begin sr 36 south end sr 44 north. sr 89 pass immedi adjac base lassen peak. total five vehicl entranc park: north south entranc sr 89, unpav road enter drakesbad junip lake south, butt lake northeast. park also access trail lead carib wilder east, well pacif crest trail, two smaller trail lead willow lake littl willow lake south. larg lodg (the lassen chalet) concess facil locat near south-west entrance, demolish 2005. new, full-servic visitor center construct location, open public 2008. near old lodg locat also locat lassen ski area, ceas oper 1992; infrastructur removed. content 1 histori 2 geography, geolog climat 3 plant 4 geolog 4.1 format basement rock 4.2 volcano rise 5 see also 6 footnot 7 refer 8 extern link history[edit] nativ american inhabit area sinc long white settler first saw lassen. nativ knew peak full fire water thought would one day blow apart.[8] white immigr mid-19th centuri use lassen peak landmark trek fertil sacramento valley. one guid immigr danish blacksmith name peter lassen, settl northern california 1830s. lassen peak name him.[8] nobl emigr trail later cut park area pass cinder cone fantast lava beds. inconsist newspap account report wit 1850 1851 describ see "fire thrown terribl height" "burn lava run sides" area cinder cone. late 1859, wit report see fire sky distance, attribut eruption. earli geologist volcanologist studi cinder cone conclud last erupt occur 1675 1700. 1980 erupt mount st. helens, unit state geolog survey (usgs) began reassess potenti risk activ volcan area cascad range. studi cinder cone estim last erupt occur 1630 1670. recent tree-r analysi place date 1666. lassen area first protect design lassen peak forest preserve. lassen peak cinder cone later declar u.s. nation monument may 1907 presid theodor roosevelt.[9] brokeoff mountain, lassen peak, chao crags, left right. area lassen peak lost 1914–15 volcan event visibl picture, encompass sliver snow. start may 1914 last 1921, seri minor major erupt occur lassen. event creat new crater, releas lava great deal ash. fortunately, warnings, one killed, sever hous along area creek destroyed. erupt activity, continu 1917, area' stark volcan beauty, lassen peak, cinder cone area surround declar nation park august 9, 1916.[8] 29-mile (47&#160;km) main park road construct 1925 1931, 10 year lassen peak erupted. near lassen peak road reach 8,512 feet (2,594&#160;m), make highest road cascad mountains. unusu 40&#160;ft (12&#160;m) snow accumul road near lake helen patch snow last july. octob 1972, portion park design lassen volcan wilder us congress (public law 92-511). nation park servic seek manag wilder keep wilder act 1964, minim develop facilities, signage, trails. manag plan 2003 add that, "the wilder experi offer moder high degre challeng adventure."[10] 1974, nation park servic took advic usg close visitor center accommod manzanita lake. survey state build would way rockslid chao crag earthquak erupt occur area.[8] age seismograph station remains. however, campground, store, museum dedic benjamin f. loomi stand near manzanita lake, welcom visitor enter park northwest entrance. mount st. helen eruption, usg intensifi monitor activ potenti activ volcano cascad range. monitor lassen area includ period measur ground deform volcanic-ga emiss continu transmiss data local network nine seismomet usg offic menlo park, california.[11] indic signific increas volcan activ detected, usg immedi deploy scientist special design portabl monitor instrument evalu threat. addition, nation park servic (nps) develop emerg respons plan would activ protect public event impend eruption. visitor lassen nation park year[12] year recreat visitor 2011 351,269 2010 384,570 2009 365,639 2008 377,361 2007 395,057 nation park servic count visitor lassen nation park use in-road induct loop vehicl entranc count vehicl enter park. buse non-report vehicl subtract vehicl count persons-per-vehicl multipli 3 multipli vehicl number.[13] geography, geolog climate[edit] map lassen area show hydrotherm featur (red dots) volcan featur remnant (yellow cones). also shown outlin brokeoff volcano (mount tehama). park locat near northern end sacramento valley. western part park featur great lava pinnacl (huge mountain creat lava flows), jag craters, steam sulphur vents. cut glaciat canyon dot thread lake rush clear streams. lassen peak reflect manzanita lake eastern part park vast lava plateau one mile (1.6&#160;km) sea level. here, small cinder cone found. (fairfield peak, hat mountain, crater butte).[14] forest pine fir, area stud small lakes, boast streams. warner valley, mark southern edg lassen plateau, featur hot spring area (boil spring lake, devil kitchen, termin geyser).[14] forested, steep valley also larg meadow wildflow spring. lassen peak made dacite, igneou rock, one world' largest plug dome volcanoes. also southernmost non-extinct volcano cascad rang (specifically, shasta cascad part range). 10,457-foot (3,187&#160;m) tall volcano sit north-east flank remain mount tehama, stratovolcano thousand feet (305 m) higher lassen 11 15 mile (18 24&#160;km) wide base.[8] empti throat partial magma chamber seri eruptions, tehama either collaps form two-mil (3.2&#160;km) wide caldera late pleistocen simpli erod away help acid vapor loosen broke rock, later carri away glaciers. broken face brokeoff mountain side present caldera brokeoff mountain (9,235 feet 2,815 m), erosion remnant mount tehama second highest peak park. mount conrad, mount diller, pilot pinnacl also remnant peak around caldera. view cinder cone cinder cone trail lead it. tree jeffrey pine (pinu jeffreyi). sulphur work geotherm area lassen peak brokeoff mountain thought mark area near center tehama' now-gon cone. geotherm area caldera littl hot spring valley, diamond point (an old lava conduit), bumpass hell (see geotherm area lassen volcan nation park). magma fuel volcano park deriv subduct coast northern california. cinder cone fantast lava beds, locat 10 mile (16&#160;km) northeast lassen peak, cinder cone volcano associ lava flow field last erupt 1650. creat seri basalt andesit andesit lava flow known fantast lava beds. four shield volcano park; mount hark (southwest corner park), red mountain (at south-centr boundary), prospect peak (in northeast corner), raker peak (north lassen peak). volcano 7,000–8,400 feet (2,133–2,560 m) sea level top cinder cone volcano. ice ages, glacier modifi help erod older volcano park. center snow accumul therefor ice radiat lassen peak, red mountain, raker peak. volcano thu show glacial scar volcano park. despit glacier currently, lassen peak 14 perman snowfields.[15] sunset lassen peak; snowfield visibl left sinc entir park locat medium high elevations, park gener cool-cold winter warm summer 7,500 feet (2,300&#160;m). elevation, climat harsh cold, cool summer temperatures. precipit within park high high due lack rain shadow coast ranges. park get precipit anywher els cascad south three sisters. snowfal new visitor center near southwest entranc 6,700 feet (2,040&#160;m) around 430 inch (1,100&#160;cm) despit face east. around lake helen, 8,200 feet (2,500&#160;m) snowfal around 600–700 inch (1,500–1,800&#160;cm), make probabl snowiest place california. addition, lake helen get averag snow accumul record station locat near volcano cascad range, maximum 178 inch (450&#160;cm).[16] snowbank persist year-round. king creek lassen peak horizon plants[edit] lie northern end sierra nevada forest ecoregion, lassen volcan nation park preserv landscap nearli exist euro-american settlement: 27,130 acr (10,980&#160;ha) old growth includ major forest types.[17][18] elev 6,500 feet domin veget commun mix conif forest. ponderosa jeffrey pines, sugar pine, white fir form forest canopi rich commun also includ speci manzanita, gooseberry, ceanothus. common wildflow includ iris, spot coralroot, pyrola, violets, lupin.[19] mixed-conif forest major commun red fir forest. elev 6,500 8,000 feet, red fir, western white pine, mountain hemlock, lodgepol pine domin commun less divers mixed-conif forest. common plant includ satin lupine, woolli mule's-ear pinemat manzanita.[19] subalpin area includ upper limit growth stand trees. 8,000 feet treeline, plant fewer overal number expos patch bare ground provid harsh environment. rock spirea, lupin, indian paintbrush, penstemon rug member community. tree commun includ whitebark pine mountain hemlock.[19] penstemon incens cedar pinu ponderosa geology[edit] main article: geolog lassen volcan area lassen peak summit brokeoff mountain. photo show 1915 tongu lava vulcan' eye. format basement rocks[edit] cinder cone fantast lava bed thermal vent sulfur work cenozoic, uplift westward tilt sierra nevada along extens volcan gener huge lahar (volcanic-deriv mud flows) pliocen becam tuscan formation. format expos anywher nation park surfac mani areas. also pliocene, basalt flow erupt vent fissur southern part park. later flow cover increasingli larg area built lava plateau. later pliocen pleistocene, basalt flow cover success thick fluid flow andesit lava, geologist call junip lava twin lake lavas. twin lake lava black, porphyrit abund xenocryst quartz (see cinder cone). anoth group andesit lava flow call flatiron, erupt time cover southwestern part park' area. park time rel featureless larg lava plain. subsequently, eastern basalt flow erupt along eastern boundari park, form low hill later erod rug terrain. volcano rise[edit] lassen peak seen lake helen lassen peak devast area pyroclast erupt start pile tephra cone northern area park. mount tehama (also known brokeoff volcano) rose stratovolcano southwestern corner park pleistocene. made roughli altern layer andesit lava tephra (volcan ash, breccia, pumice) increas amount tephra elevation. height, tehama probabl 11,000 feet (3,400&#160;m) high. approxim 350,000 year ago cone collaps form two-mil (3.2&#160;km) wide caldera empti throat partial magma chamber seri eruptions. one erupt occur lassen peak stands, consist fluid, black, glassi dacite, form layer 1,500 feet (460&#160;m) thick (outcrop seen columnar rock lassen' base). glacial period (ice ages) present wisconsinan glaciation, glacier modifi help erod older volcano park, includ remain tehama. mani glacial features, deposit scars, however, cover tephra avalanches, destroy eruptions. roughli 27,000 year ago (older data gave age 18,000 years), lassen peak start form dacit lava dome quickli push way tehama' destroy north-eastern flank. lava dome push way up, shatter overlay rock, form blanket talu around emerg volcano. lassen rose reach present height rel short time, probabl littl years. lassen peak also partial erod ice age glaciers, least one extend much 7 mile (11&#160;km) volcano itself. sinc then, smaller dacit dome form around lassen. largest these, chao crags, north lassen peak. phreatic (steam explosion) eruptions, dacit andesit lava flow cinder cone format persist modern times. bumpass hell contain boil springs, mudpots, fumarol activ hot spring mud pot lassen area. spring site occurr certain extremophil micro-organisms, capabl surviv extrem hot environments.[20] see also[edit] 1938 poster lassen volcan nation park chao crag geotherm area lassen
